overview: Growing up there was always that one hot MILF in the neighborhood. She might have invited you over for dinner, or even given you a kiss on the cheek, but that's about it. Did she ever leave you wishing for more? Welcome to Mom's Guide To Sex! First they will tease you, then seduce you, and before you know it they are rubbing your tummy while their jealous daughters watch in despair. Every scene is a trilogy of mature mommys trying to mate with their much younger daughter's counterparts, not stopping until every urge is satisfied. Put on your big boy pants and let these mommys give you a thrill.
title: Mom's Guide To Sex
